title: Lag is going crazy again ? or am i crazy
body: Which one is it ? I recently get 900+ ping a lot and i live in Perth. My ISP is TPG.

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure a lot of people have much higher ping with TPG, a lot of my friends had it and had to change because the lag was unbearable, I would suggest switching to a more reliable ISP. 

Because you live in Perth you will have higher ping seeing as most of the main ISP companies are in Sydney.
